Topic.Title: Link text problem in game book

Posts.EditableText: I am halfway through writing  a game book game on line. Suddenly at this advanced stage I  find that link text is vanishing, making the links inoperable. I enter a link, add link text, save. If I then play the game to test it , the text has gone. If I have two or more links on a page, only the last one blanks out. I have got around this by adding an unnecessary link and allowing it to be the fall guy, but this is a stupid way to solve a problem. I am not too familiar with game book, but tried it for a change.
